title: Workshop on Developing E-Learning Systems Applying Deductive Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of software engineering and experience operating e-learning systems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course designed to enable current practitioners to develop systematic e-learning systems by applying software engineering principles

learning_goals: Learners can create architectural diagrams for e-learning systems using UML (Unified Modeling Language)
Learners can systematically explain the e-learning content development process based on deductive instructional methods
Learners can create and execute project management plans applying software engineering principles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
